artist: Artist: Yoshikawa Kanpō; Publisher: Satō Shōtarō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Ōiwa Tokuzō
inscription: in left margin: 友人ヘンリー、エチ、バート君 {Yūjin Henrii Echi Haato kun} (To my friend Henry H. Heart); 大正十四年五月廿三日夕 {Taishō jūyonen gogatsu nijūsan nichi yū}; 平安吉川観方記 {Heian[?] Yoshikawa Kanpō ki}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
portfolio: From Creative Prints by Kanpō, First Collection (Kanpō sōsaku hanga, dai isshū 観方創作版画第壱集)
text: Second print in a series of six. Actor Jitsukawa Enjaku II (1877-1951) as Igami no Gonta in the play "Yoshitsune senbon zakura" 義経千本桜 (Yoshitsune and the Thousand Cherry Trees).
title: Two, Kawachiya's Gonta
